dash.get_started: ğŸ‘‹ Welcome to Daasko management bot Hereâ€™s how to get started: 1) Add the bot to a group Use this link to choose a group and add the bot as an admin: ğŸ‘‰ https://t.me/analytiquesbot?startgroup=new 2) Add the bot to your channels Open your channel â†’ Administrators â†’ Add admin â†’ select @analytiquesbot and give it the necessary permissions. 3) Use the dashboard buttons â€¢ ğŸ”’ Force-Join â€“ make new members join your channels before they can speak â€¢ ğŸ“ˆ Analytics â€“ see joins, leaves, and activity â€¢ ğŸ“£ Campaigns â€“ create labeled invite links with statistics â€¢ ğŸ“£ Mass DM â€“ message people who joined through your invite links â€¢ ğŸ§¾ Reports â€“ export clean, professional PDF reports You can always come back here with /start.

gt.menu_lead: Configure Force-Join: choose which channels members must join before they can speak.

list.none: No Force-Join channels are configured for this group yet.
list.title: ğŸ“‹ Force-Join channels / groups:

clear.ok: Force-Join has been cleared for this group.

how.body:
How Force-Join works:

1) You add one or more channels / groups.
2) New members are muted when they join the group.
3) They get a DM with buttons to join your channels.
4) After they join and tap "I joined", the bot unmutes them automatically.

add.prompt: âœï¸ Set Force-Join Send the channel @username or invite link you want to require in this group. Examples: â€¢ @mychannel â€¢ https://t.me/mychannel You can add multiple channels one by one.
add.added: âœ… Added: {target} New members in this group must now join this channel before they can speak. Send another channel to add more, or tap â¬…ï¸ Back in the menu.

group_tools.help:
With group tools you can:

â€¢ Require users to join specific channels before speaking
â€¢ Automatically mute new members until they join
â€¢ Track joins and leaves for your groups

Open this in a linked group to configure the rules.

help.body:
ğŸ“Œ What this bot does
âœ… Works in groups & channels
âœ… Tracks joins, leaves & invite links
âœ… Daily / weekly / monthly growth reports
âœ… Organise invite links into campaigns
âœ… Filter members by name, characters, country or phone code
âœ… Force-join required channels before access
âœ… Multi-language: English & French

Your all-in-one Telegram analytics & management bot.

massdm.home: ğŸ“£ Mass DM Send a broadcast to people in your audience (members of your linked groups & channels). Only users who have started the bot in private at least once can receive messages. Others will appear as failed in the summary.

aud.note: Only users who have started the bot in private at least once can actually be DM'ed. Others will show as failed when sending.
